content: {"name": "Good Samaritan Food Network", "alternate_name": "", "description": "Clients can acquire referrals from multiple non-profits around town, The Salvation Army, United Way, Ross County Child & Family Services, Community Action, Etc.\n", "email": "", "url": "", "status": "active", "address": {"address_1": "477 North Woodbridge Avenue", "address_2": null, "city": "Chillicothe", "state_province": "OH", "postal_code": "45601", "country": "US"}, "location": {"latitude": 39.3373922, "longitude": -83.0041735}, "phones": [{"number": "(740) 774-6303", "type": "voice"}], "regular_schedule": [{"weekday": "Monday", "opens_at": "12:30", "closes_at": "18:30"}, {"weekday": "Tuesday", "opens_at": "12:30", "closes_at": "18:30"}, {"weekday": "Wednesday", "opens_at": "12:30", "closes_at": "18:30"}, {"weekday": "Thursday", "opens_at": "12:30", "closes_at": "18:30"}, {"weekday": "Friday", "opens_at": "12:30", "closes_at": "18:30"}], "service_attributes": [{"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "ID required"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Referral required"}, {"attribute_key": "OFFERING", "attribute_value": "Clients can visit: Once a month"}, {"attribute_key": "INFO", "attribute_value": "Closed on major holidays"}]}
